game.title: The Forbidden Temple Quest
game.objective: Retrieve the Ancient Scroll from High Priestess Elysia
game.description: Embark on a perilous journey to find the hidden temple in the jungle. Successfully recover the scroll and avoid the treacherous traps within.

task.description: Discover the location of the temple's entrance, marked by a peculiar tree in the jungle.

task.objective: Overcome the traps of the first chamber
task.description: Bypass the initial traps and solve the riddle to proceed deeper into the temple.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian with your wits
